main.description: Get a short-lived signed ticket for subscribing to MLS events via WebSocket. The ticket is valid for 30 seconds and must be used to establish a WebSocket connection.

convoId.description: Optional: limit subscription to a specific conversation. If omitted, subscribes to all conversations the user is a member of.

ticket.description: Signed subscription ticket (JWT) to use as query parameter when connecting to WebSocket

endpoint.description: WebSocket endpoint URL to connect to (e.g., wss://mls.catbird.blue/xrpc/blue.catbird.mls.subscribeConvoEvents)

expiresAt.description: When the ticket expires (ISO 8601). Must connect before this time.

errors.name: Forbidden
errors.description: User is not a member of the specified conversation
